sample_error_pairs.reference: Hey,                  I am Rey from मिंत्रा,        here to assist you;                     shall we proceed further in Hindi,    or    English ?
sample_error_pairs.ground_truth: I am Ray from Myntra, here to assist you. Shall we proceed further in Hindi or English?

sample_error_pairs.reference: I couldn't find "Laamic" in your orders, but I see items from brands like Love Beauty & Planet, लैक्मे, ड्रेसबेरी, LeCalla, and Carlton London. Could you confirm if it's one of these or provide more details about the product?
sample_error_pairs.ground_truth: I couldn't find Lakme in your orders. But I see items from brands like Love Beauty and Planet, Lakme, Dressberry, Lakala and Carlton London. Could you confirm if it's one of these or provide more details about the product?

sample_error_pairs.reference: Got it! You might be referring to the लैक्मे Youth Infinity Anti Aging Night Cream with Pro-Retinol C. Let me check its delivery status for you.
sample_error_pairs.ground_truth: Got it. You might be referring to the Lakme Youth Infinity anti-aging night cream with Pro retinol C. Let me check its delivery status for you. Your Lakme Youth Infinity anti-aging night cream with Pro retinol C 50 GD will be delivered on or before 27 July.

Your लैक्मे Youth Infinity Anti Aging Night Cream with Pro-Retinol C - 50g will be delivered on or before 27 July.
Please tell me, is there anything else I can help you with?
sample_error_pairs.ground_truth: Sure, what else can I assist you with?

sample_error_pairs.reference: Alright, let me check the delivery status for your Love Beauty & Planet Argan Oil and Lavender Shampoo. Give me a moment.
sample_error_pairs.ground_truth: We'll be sending you a quick feedback form via SMS. Your input would really help us improve. Thank you for choosing Myntra. Have a great day.
